title: Mursia
description: A modern village on the northwest coast of the Mediterranean island of Pantelleria. Mursia lies atop a settlement of late Bronze Age date that is associated with the cemetery (Sesi) that lies immediately to its south.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates for the Bronze Age site after Cattani 2019a.
properties.title: OSM Location of modern village of Mursia
